readable.content: A child holding up a sign with a skull and crossbones . A child wearing a pirates costume holds up a skull and crossbones sign . A little boy dressed as a pirate holding up a skull and crossbones 's flag A little boy dressed as a pirate is holding up the skull pirate flag . A young boy dressed like a pirate is holding a sign with a skull and crossbones on it .
